definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
to help the poor/almsgiving for the needy/to assist poor households or poor regions
to love Hong Kong (usually implying that one also supports the PRC government)

pinyin: qi3 ye4 she4 hui4 ze2 ren4

definition: to establish schools/to raise the standard of education
cross a river in the same boat (idiom); fig. having common interests/obliged to collaborate towards common goals
to walk hand in hand/to cooperate
to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition/forming a bridge between earlier and later stages
mass/involving everyone/united/lit. to assemble the multitude
lit. when you drink water, think of its source (idiom); gratitude for blessings and their well-spring/Don't forget where your happiness come from./Be grateful for all your blessings!
see 念念不忘[nian4 nian4 bu4 wang4]
